(function($, win, doc) {
    'use strict';
    var example = {
        opts : {
            obj : '.exam__box',
            inputArea : '.input_area',
            inputText : '.input_text',
            input : 'input',
            btnArea : '.btn_area',
            btn : 'button'
        },
        init : function () {
            this.setElements();
            this.bindEvents();
        },
        setElements : function () {
            this.obj = $(this.opts.obj);
            this.btnArea = this.obj.find(this.opts.btnArea);
            this.inputArea = this.obj.find(this.opts.inputArea);
            this.inputText = this.inputArea.find(this.opts.inputText);
            this.input = this.inputText.find(this.opts.input);
            this.btn = this.btnArea.find(this.opts.btn);
        },
        bindEvents : function () {
            this.btn.on('click', $.proxy(this.clickFunc, this));
            this.input.on('focus', $.proxy(this.inputFunc, this));
        },
        clickFunc : function (e) {
            var targetIndex = $(e.currentTarget).index();
            if (targetIndex === 1) {
                this.input.triggerHandler('focus');
            } else {
                this.input.trigger('focus');
            }
        },
        inputFunc : function (e) {
            $(e.currentTarget).css('background', 'yellow');
        }
    }
    example.init();
})(jQuery, window, document);
